name: Aisha Sharma
title: Creative Director
quote: Mohit has a rare instinct for light. Every frame feels intentional yet effortless, which is why we trust him with our flagship campaigns.

name: Rahul Verma
title: Head of Brand
quote: From aerial moves to macro textures, Mohit and his team delivered a luxurious film that pushed our brand perception globally.

name: Maya Iyer
title: Producer
quote: Working with Mohit means calm, precise communication and visuals that elevate the script beyond expectation.
